key_findings.importance: This highlights the emotional and psychological aspects of participating in clinical trials, which could be important for understanding user motivations and designing user experiences.
key_findings.insight: Users see clinical trials as a source of hope and opportunity for care
supporting_quotes: clinical trials are a good opportunity to get care that they might not other have access plus there's always just the hope because they might have tried a lot of things and nothing's work so far and the hope is a good reason to participate

key_findings.importance: This suggests that users may be overwhelmed by complex interfaces or systems, which could impact their ability to effectively use the product.
key_findings.insight: Users struggle with managing multiple features simultaneously
supporting_quotes: now I usually like I had that feature working I can never get all the features working at the same time

opportunities.opportunity: Simplify the interface or provide better guidance on how to use multiple features
opportunities.rationale: This could improve user satisfaction and effectiveness in using the system

pain_points.impact: This can lead to frustration and potentially hinder the user's ability to effectively use the system

summary: The research sessions revealed that users see clinical trials as a source of hope and opportunity for care, highlighting the emotional and psychological aspects of their experience. However, users also expressed difficulty in managing multiple features simultaneously, suggesting a need for simpler interfaces or better guidance. This represents an opportunity for improvement in the user experience.

user_needs.context: The user expressed frustration with not being able to get all features working at the same time
user_needs.need: Users need to be able to easily manage and navigate multiple features
